name: Med/Surg Lectures
body:
## Recorded Lectures
Here you can access audio archives of previous lectures for 2014-2015 Med/Surg. Hope this helps with your finals and/or NCLEX review.

### Fall 2014 (Med/Surg I)

IV Fluids & Electrolytes

Reproductive Systems

Hematology & Transfusions

Perioperative & Integumentary

Musculoskeletal

Immunology, Infection, & Oncology

Gastrointestinal  
12/3/14 - [Part 1](https://www.dropbox.com/s/5r3cxjh7lkpa1ws/Stomach%20Part%201.m4a?dl=0), [Part 2](https://www.dropbox.com/s/3qwgw39vcyxxgm9/Stomach%202.m4a?dl=0), [Part 3](https://www.dropbox.com/s/r7v162a9dfp20mv/Stomach%203.m4a?dl=0)  
12/8/14 - [Part 1](https://www.dropbox.com/s/hd52jh5w4ozt8rm/Stomach%204.m4a?dl=0), [Part 2](https://www.dropbox.com/s/1dy52ybwt8rq63s/Stomach%205.m4a?dl=0)

### Spring 2015 (Med/Surg II)

Hepatobiliary/Pancreatic Systems

Cardiovascular & Peripheral Vascular

Endocrine Systems  
3/2/15 - [Part 1](https://www.dropbox.com/s/te4hdxzw5eclmq7/Endocrine-pituitary.m4a?dl=0), [Part 2](https://www.dropbox.com/s/thk84g9wpwc2322/Endocrine2.m4a?dl=0)

*Respiratory & Acid/Base*

*Neurologic Systems*

*Renal Systems*

### Contributions
Want to donate your recording to this list? [Email me](mailto:mercurial44@gmail.com) your files and I'll put them up!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
